mapper.select: /* FileMapper - selectAttachFile */ SELECT ID AS id , NAME AS name , PATH AS path , CAPACITY AS capacity , EXTENSION AS extension FROM ATTACH_FILE WHERE ID = #{fileId}

/* FileMapper - selectAttachFiles */ SELECT AF.ID AS id , AF.NAME AS name , AF.PATH AS path , AF.CAPACITY AS capacity , AF.EXTENSION AS extension FROM ATTACH_FILE AF INNER JOIN ATTACH_FILE_GROUP AFG ON AF.ID = AFG.ATTACH_FILE_ID WHERE AFG.ENTITY_ID = #{entityId}
